1. Total Bilirubin (mg/dL)
2. Serum Albumin (g/dL)
3. INR (Prothrombin Time Ratio/INR)
4. Presence and severity of ascites
5. Presence and severity of hepatic encephalopathy

The Child-Pugh score assigns points to each of these factors and then sums them up to classify liver disease severity.

4. Presence/Severity of Ascites
5. Presence/Severity of Hepatic Encephalopathy (HE)
